Text.TextContent: Updates status summary for given owner, based on changed ID lists and time range. Blocks IDlist with prefixing T:-timestamp- value before respective IDs. If two timestamps match, the latter is added with one unit/tick/ms to make it newer. IDs do not appear in the list multiple times, but are always represented by the latest update item.

ColumnData.TextContent: Starting time of changes updated in this cycle
Changed ID list on this cycle
Remove entries older than amount of seconds given here

Header.text: Method Call: EnsureUpdateOnStatusSummary ( Owner, UpdateTime, ChangedIDList, RemoveExpiredEntriesSeconds )

Text.TextContent: Guarantee update on StatusSummary, retry if fails. Time-stamp blockify the IDs, placing ID aways highest in the graph. Remove expired blocks entirely.
